tab1.text1:
Hi, all Community has been a close-knit community of gamers since January 2016. 1 Owner 3 Admins to help you ingame and on discord. System ticket on discord.
I offer 28 servers between ASE & ASA with different dinos mods.

      1. F1 for Shop and kit Starter. 
      2. Option in teleporter to travel between cluster.
      3. Dino finder in your inventory click on map and open finder.
      4. Tab donation to buy item and dinos.
      5.To find my other ASA servers click on the TUTO link at the    bottom. I propose Primal / Annunaki / Omega / Supreme / Dox.
       

    The other servers have an automatic crossplay store and each server has 100 slots. I use Nitrado to do the advertising on my dedicated servers more powerful. Join the discord.
tab1.text2:
● XP: x10, Harvest: x50, Taming: x20
          ● Breed x10, Gestation: x10, Egg Hatch: x10
          ● Player Level: 105
          ● Level Wild 600 - After Tame 900
          ● Keep all your Stuff on Death with (Death Inventory Keeper)

                              Open Shop Consol players

The mod is crossplay supported. The typical method of opening the shop is to use the assigned button shown on the buff icon (F1-F5). When on controller the way to open the shop is through the multi-use menu. To open the multi-use menu use the left face button (Either X for Xbox or Square for Playstation (You can also do this on Mouse and Key with holding R)) and navigate to the shop icon in the menu. Make sure to select the option in the menu with either A/X or RT and if a second menu opens to select the Gold Bag icon you must press A/X or RT on that as well, do not let go of the left face button while in the menu or when you have hovered the icon assuming it will open the shop, you must press A/X or RT specifically to select the shop in order for it to open properly.

tab2.text1:
1. Do not undermesh, glitch, exploit, insults, racism, abuse or cheat.
          2. You are not allowed to spam foundations to excess. (This applies to all structures).
          3. Don't build too close to another base.
          4. Generated boss dinos are 'FORBIDDEN' in other players' bases. if I have a report with proof its a ban.
          5. When you buy or tame a dino you must always clone him because NO REFUND, its the same with your stuff you have upgrade station to make bp.
          6. To prevent dinos from being stolen, put them in a cryopod or under a forcefield
          7. Don’t use Ark Data to transfert your dinos and stuffs between cluster. NO REFUND.
          8. Forbidden on setting up a personal store ... Rip all your structures.

tab3.text1:
By default, you start with 0 points and you have 30 points every 20 minutes.


     Vip Bronze    : 10 euros   1 Kit in shop  + 1 Dino Primal or Descended
     Vip Silver       : 20 euros  2 Kits in shop + 3 Dinos Primal or Descended
     Vip Gold         : 30 euros  3 Kits in shop + 6 Dinos Primal or Descended
     Vip Platinum  : 50 euros  5 Kits in shop + 10 Dinos Primal or Descended



     In you character click on AAT to find your EOSID.
     After a purchase do a ticket on discord to get your VIP pack.
     All donations allow to keep the server alive and to buy new slots.
